page.title: 18A School Day
page.content: We have four playtimes at school. The first is before school when we dont play much but talk with our friends. At morning break we have a quarter of an hour when we play games like boys after girls ,it, or chainy. The third playtime is after lunch We play lots of games such as chainy orange balls,freeze,stuck in the mud British Bulldog,sun and shadow and grandmother's footsteps. During afternoon play we often dont play much. Chainy is my schools favourite game.You need at least 10 children and one person is it.He has to catch the other people.When he has touched some one they join hands and try to catch the others.When four are joined together they can make two pairs and so on until one person is left.He is the winner.
